description: This file defines a Fragment class named IndiceFragment for an Android application. The fragment presents a UI index screen with three Call-To-Action (CTA) buttons and a menu button for instructions, handling navigation and user interaction via button clicks and key events.

classes.name: IndiceFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays an index screen with navigation buttons and handles focus and navigation logic within the UI.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of IndiceFragment.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes views, sets texts, and configures focus and key event handling.

methods.name: setupFocusTransitions
methods.description: Defines Android focus navigation among buttons.

methods.name: openPrototype
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with a prototype fragment based on index.
